Description

QLIC, Long Island City’s newest and most vibrant rental residences, places you right in the center of one of NYC’s most dynamic neighborhoods. Choose from a wide range of studio, one, two and three-bedroom layouts, all with contemporary finishes and wired for today’s essential needs.

QLIC, Long Island City’s newest and most vibrant rental residences, places you right in the center of one of NYC’s most dynamic neighborhoods. Choose from a wide range of studio, one, two and three-bedroom layouts, all with contemporary finishes and wired for today’s essential needs. Relax with a variety entertaining amenities, including a rooftop outdoor swimming pool.
